author: cmpilato
msg: Merge r8292 and remove it from STATUS:
Fix a nasty bug in the 'changes' table reading code that caused in
invalid set of changes to be returned.  This bug *probably* only gets
triggered by cvs2svn during directory pruning, but cvs2svn is only
gonna get more popular as time goes on...
Approved by: cmpilato, kfogel, ghudson

author: ringstrom
msg: * 1.0-stabilization/STATUS: Add r8404.

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix the double ctrl-c bug on Win32 and handle the Win32 specific
ctrl-break signal SIGBREAK. The double ctrl-c bug was discussed here:
http://www.contactor.se/~dast/svn/archive-2004-01/0522.shtml
Message-ID: <4007F422.6090801@thoughtworks.net>
* subversion/svnadmin/main.c
* subversion/svnlook/main.c
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(signal_handler): Ignore the just received signal. This is needed since
some platforms (e.g. Win32) resets the signal handler when a signal is
received.
(main): Handle SIGBREAK on platforms that have it, e.g. Win32.

author: kfogel
msg: Tweak cvs2svn documentation.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add my vote for the merge ancestry stuffs.
